interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: APIVITA Queen Bee Holistic Age Defense Night Cream 1.69 fl.oz. |Intensive Night Treatment That Speeds Skin Regeneration, Smooths Wrinkle & Increases Skin Elasticity with Royal Jelly & Hyaluronic Acid
Review Date: 2021/10/09
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Apivita', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Top Style': 'Cream', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Firming', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 3.5 x 2.76 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'Item model number': '5201279071806'}
Review Text: This is a thick, creamy moisturizer that is absorbed well into the skin. I don't think $95 I stood much to pay for a high-quality night moisturizer, which this is. It leaves my skin feeling very moisturized and I've used it several nights in a row without it irritating my sensitive skin. It is fragrant but still doesn't irritate my skin.
Review Title: Thick and creamy moisturizer
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
24K Gold Under Eye Mask– 20 Pairs- Under Eye Patches with Face Massager Roller, Anti-Aging Hyaluronic Acid Collagen Eye Masks for Dark Circles and Puffiness Dark Under Eyes Treatment FRLEDM {'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 6.8 x 1.1 inches; 1.2 Pounds', 'Batteries': '1 AA batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '616985543564', 'Manufacturer': 'FRLEDM'} I wish I was one of those girls that wake up looking rested and flawless. But some days I wake up looking like I cried my eyes out all night, even though I slept peacefully! Not fair. These under-eye patches have been helping you girl out. I don't know if this is how you're supposed to use them but I put them in the fridge overnight and then use them in the morning when my eyes are puffy. It feels amazing and brings down the puffiness. Helps puffy morning eyes Karuna Hit Refresh Eucalyptus Fiber-Infused Sheet Mask: Burst of Hydration & Refreshing Glow, 3 Count Karuna {'Brand': 'Karuna', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 4.88 x 0.71 inches; 4.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MSF1006 - CA', 'UPC': '857950007159'} These masks were nice, felt refreshing to use, and the size fits my face well. I don't think they are that special though and there are many other masks of this type out there, so for the price of $18 for 3 sheet masks, I think it's a bit overpriced. Beautiful packaging though and goo product overall. Refreshing but pricey Altaba Long Wavy Wigs Ombre gray Wig Synthetic Wigs Middle Part Natural Looking Heat Resistant Party Cosplay Full Wig for Women Altaba {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'Altaba', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'UPC': '788436507620'} [[VIDEOID:bca26ab2386974e3c51190208f1d77a8]] I buy quite a few wigs and this is by far my favorite one I have gotten in a long time. My hair is very dark brown underneath it and it covers the hair beautifully and in this video, I didn't even fo as good of a job as I could have to put it on and it still looks amazing. The seam in the middle part is very subtle and if you part some of the hair to the side you can even hide the seam and it looks even more natural. I like that the top is dark and that it's ombre because it looks more natural than if it was all grey. It's beautiful grey color and the hair is very soft, long, and full, And the curls are gorgeous. I can't believe this wig costs $19.99! I've gotten other wigs that are much more expensive an dnot nearly as nice as this one. Great product! Amazing - Beautiful and so soft Short Bob Wigs with Bangs Straight Wigs Natural Black Short Wig for Sweet Girl Heat Resistant Synthetic Hair Replacement Wig for Women Wonder Girl {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'Wonder Girl', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '11.54 x 8.5 x 2.2 inches; 8.15 Ounces'} [[VIDEOID:54a8f061af1d9aae2aa01ace5419c0f7]] I can't believe this wig is only $9.90. It is so soft and cute. I think it looks natural and it is so much fun to be able to have a short bob with bangs (my natural hair is very long hair). Great product at a great price! Soft hair and natural looking StudentsZone Fashion Headbands for Women, Cute Bow Headband for Spa, Makeup or Washing Face, No Slip Head Bands for Girls ( 1 * Pink Polka Dot + 1* Pink Leopard ) StudentsZone {'Color': 'Pink', 'Material': 'Fleece', 'Fabric Type': 'Fleece', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Face Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '13.35 x 10 x 2.17 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} I think these are better for a girl rather than a woman, they are very small and slide up the head, don't stay put. And I have a very small head so that's not the issue, I just wish they were a bit larger. Soft but small and doesn't stay put Spove Spiral Hair Ties Hair Coils Hair Coil Seamless Non-slip Mixed Ponytail Holder Hair Ties for Women & Kids 15pcs SPOVE {'Material': 'Plastic, Cotton', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'SPOVE', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Pieces': '15', 'Package Dimensions': '6.54 x 5.83 x 1.3 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '631145785158'} This is a great assortment of hair ties for $6.99. Their of good quality and the colors are nice. It's a nice variety of cotton and spiral chord ties. Great assortment for the price LUVCIRCUS 001 Professional Hair Brush-This luxury boar and nylon bristle hair brush is a meticulously crafted premium, flat hair brush. An exceptional hairbrush for women who love gorgeous hair LUVCIRCUS {'Brand': 'LUVCIRCUS', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Special Feature': 'Not-applicable', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '9 x 4.75 x 1.5 inches; 7.65 Ounces'} I'm not entirely sure why this brush is so expensive. It's actually not comfortable at all, the bristles are very sharp. Expensive and not comfortable 2 Pack Luxury Shower Cap for Women Long Hair Reusable, Waterproof Large Shower Bath Caps Adjustable, Washable, Breathable POZILAN {'Brand': 'POZILAN', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Size': 'Large', 'Inner Material': 'EVA', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '9.49 x 7.56 x 1.57 inches; 4.73 Ounces'} These shower caps are made with thick material that definitely keeps your hair dry during showers. I have long, thick, naturally curly hair that I straighten so I don't like getting it wet because then it frizzes or curls. These shower caps keep all of my hair in, there's plenty of room. Cute design too, I mean as cute as you can look in a shower cap... Great material and roomy 6pcs Bridal Pearl Headband for Women Wedding Hair Accessories,White Faux Pearl Hairbands Bridal Bridesmaid Bridal Hair Hoop | Bridesmaid Proposal Gifts (Different Pearl-6pack) HZDK {'Color': 'White', 'Material': 'Pearl', 'Brand': 'HZDK', 'Size': '6 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 7.48 x 1.73 inches; 4.16 Ounces'} You get 6 very cute pearl headbands for $14.99, that's an incredible deal! The headbands are actually comfortable which is incredible because we all know how headache-inducing headbands can be when they're uncomfortable.

The styles are fairly similar but the pear sizes vary in size and shape so you can look more conservative or more expressive depending on which one you choose. I love them, they are of good quality and look so pretty. Very cute and great value! APIVITA Queen Bee Holistic Age Defense Night Cream 1.69 fl.oz. |Intensive Night Treatment That Speeds Skin Regeneration, Smooths Wrinkle & Increases Skin Elasticity with Royal Jelly & Hyaluronic Acid {'Brand': 'Apivita', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Top Style': 'Cream', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Firming', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 3.5 x 2.76 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'Item model number': '5201279071806'} This is a thick, creamy moisturizer that is absorbed well into the skin. I don't think $95 I stood much to pay for a high-quality night moisturizer, which this is. It leaves my skin feeling very moisturized and I've used it several nights in a row without it irritating my sensitive skin. It is fragrant but still doesn't irritate my skin. Thick and creamy moisturizer
